Action.author: markparz
Action.body: This is really a dead page, that we are ripping pieces out of for other pieces of doc... once completely ransacked, we'll delete this page altogether.

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Hi Min, What's being reviewed here? I didn't see a CR, and we don't need this this page. I think we should just close this issue.

Action.author: tkuhrt
Action.body: If the page is not needed, it should be removed completely from being generated and ensure that there are no links to it in the rest of the documentation. Please don't close the issue without fixing. I can still get to this page.

Action.author: luomin
Action.body: Hi, ~tkuhrt , I've removed the old documentation 'architecture.rst' as you pointed here, together with 'whyfabric.rst' doc in this folder, and the other pages in this folder seems contain no links to these two docs. the patch is https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/13387/.
